formattedAddress: 180-182 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 180-182 Dyckman St, New York, NY 10040, USA

editorialSummary.text: Casual counter-serve chain for build-your-own sandwiches & salads, with health-conscious options.

originalText.text:
One of several subway stores I've been to that was clean, the meat and veggies looked and was very fresh and friendly customer service. This store is a smaller store with big promise. I've had bad encounters at other subways before not this on on Dykman.
Thumbs up to this subway.

text.text:

originalText.text: I do Deliveries almost every day, I went to this Subway to pick up an order at 10pm. The surprise was that "it was closed" even when the order was already paid through Uber eats, the man inside refused to solve the problem in a very rude and hostile way.

text.text: I do Deliveries almost every day, I went to this Subway to pick up an order at 10pm. The surprise was that "it was closed" even when the order was already paid through Uber eats, the man inside refused to solve the problem in a very rude and hostile way.

originalText.text: I order ahead of time on the app every day usually never have a problem. Until today. The worker today told me when I went to pick up my order that they weren't opened. I had already placed my order from the app and paid and she wasn't going to give me my order claiming they weren't opened. Yet the hours say open at 8am and this was 10:30am. I showed her that my order was accepted and that I paid and that was when she realized she had to make my order. I ordered a tuna melt. Well she didn't even bother to heat it up and it was just thrown together. On top of it the cookies I ordered weren't even ready so I had to go with cookies I don't even like. I love going to this place every day but this experience with this one worker (this is the second time she's pulled this with me) made me give it a low review.

originalText.text: Horrible subway experience. There’s a worker there that rarely does her job. She loves slacking. Every time I go when she’s working, she leaves the store unattended because she takes multiple long breaks. when she’s working it’s so easy for someone to steal their products . She is also very lazy, I clearly saw bread in the back and when I tried to order a sandwich, she told me that there was no bread. She should definitely either be reprimanded or replaced. And I’m not trying to be mean or rude in any way, she’s just not a good worker.

originalText.text: The store was empty with no employees around. I showed up at my pickup time, my order was not made. I was talking to employee and she walks away with another employee that came back from store.  One girl comes back toasts both sandwiches, when only one suppose to be. I let it pass. Tells me she cant give me extra veggies I ordered , I let it pass. Tells me she my order has.l no salami. I show her order on my phone. She then lies and tells me age can't give me salami because she put 1 extra slice of turkey by mistake and she cant take it off. After saying to her that's not my fault she decides she is gonna put the salami. And she wore her mask down on her chin the entire time.
